Text: This weapon is also equipped with an electroshock generator that discharges electricity on impact that strikes multiple targets.
This weapon is also equipped with an electroshock generator that discharges electricity when it connects that strikes multiple targets.
The electroshock generator mounted on the gloves discharges electricity on impact that strikes multiple targets.
The pneumatic hammer unit mounted on the gloves will, when powered, occasionally inflict additional damage and even knock targets out.
The electroshock generator mounted on the {0} discharges electricity on impact that strikes multiple targets.
The electricity that's discharged from the electroshock generator, mounted on the blade, on impact may strike multiple targets.
Though the energy edge emitter lined along the edge of the blade reduces its cutting power, it more than compensates with its own destructive energy.

Though the energy edge emitter lined along the edge of the blade reduces its cutting power, it more than compensates with its own destructive energy.
The stabilization wings mounted on the sides allows the spear to fly farther and faster when thrown.
The hammer's head is lined up with vicious spikes for extra mayhem.
The serrated blade worked into the hammer's head can inflict deadly bleeding wounds.
